GSD.description:
bfq: fix use-after-free in bfq_dispatch_request

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 5687958bf18f84384d809f521210d0f5deed03b0. For more details please see the references link.
